con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions targetNamespace="http://tempuri.org" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:tns="http://tempuri.org" xmlns:tm="http://microsoft.com/wsdl/mime/textMatching/" xmlns:soapenc="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:s="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:mime="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/mime/" xmlns:http="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/http/" xmlns:flt="http://interoperability.gc.ca/fault/2.0/"> <wsdl:types> <xsd:schema xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <s:import namespace="http://tempuri.org" schemaLocation="https://amer-poc7-prod.apigee.net/sinvalidation/2.0/?xsd=../XSDs/ValidateRegistry.xsd"/> <s:import namespace="http://interoperability.gc.ca/fault/2.0/" schemaLocation="https://amer-poc7-prod.apigee.net/sinvalidation/2.0/?xsd=../XSDs/fault.xsd"/> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="ValidateSecretsSoapOut"> <wsdl:part element="tns:ValidateSecretsResponse" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="ValidateSecretsSoapIn"> <wsdl:part element="tns:ValidateSecrets" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="ValidationFaultMessage"> <wsdl:part element="flt:ValidationFault" name="part"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="ServiceUnavailableFaultMessage"> <wsdl:part element="flt:ServiceUnavailableFault" name="part"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="GenericFaultMessage"> <wsdl:part element="flt:GenericFault" name="part"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="ValidationServiceSoap"> <wsdl:operation name="ValidateSecrets"> <wsdl:input message="tns:ValidateSecretsSoapIn"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:ValidateSecretsSoapOut"></wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault message="tns:GenericFaultMessage" name="GenericFault"></wsdl:fault> <wsdl:fault message="tns:ValidationFaultMessage" name="ValidationFault"></wsdl:fault> <wsdl:fault message="tns:ServiceUnavailableFaultMessage" name="ServiceUnavailableFault"></wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="ValidationServiceSoap" type="tns:ValidationServiceSoap"> <soap:binding transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="ValidateSecrets"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://tempuri.org/ValidateSecrets" style="document"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="GenericFault"> <soap:fault name="GenericFault" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> <wsdl:fault name="ValidationFault"> <soap:fault name="ValidationFault" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> <wsdl:fault name="ServiceUnavailableFault"> <soap:fault name="ServiceUnavailableFault" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="ValidationService"> <wsdl:port binding="tns:ValidationServiceSoap" name="ValidationServiceSoap"> <soap:address location="https://amer-poc7-prod.apigee.net/sinvalidation/2.0/"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

<s:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://tempuri.org" xmlns:tmp="http://tempuri.org" xmlns:s="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <s:element name="ValidateSecrets"> <s:complexType> <s:sequence> <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="ValidationRequest" type="tmp:ValidationRequest"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> </s:element> <s:complexType name="ValidationRequest"> <s:sequence> <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="ValidationIdentifier" type="s:string"/> <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="ValidationKey" type="tmp:ValidationKey"/> <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="ValidationItems" type="tmp:ArrayOfValidationItem"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> <s:complexType name="ValidationKey"> <s:sequence> <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Name" type="s:string"/> <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Value" type="s:string"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> <s:complexType name="ArrayOfValidationItem"> <s:sequence> <s:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="ValidationItem" nillable="true" type="tmp:ValidationItem"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> <s:complexType name="ValidationItem"> <s:sequence> <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="ItemName" type="s:string"/> <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Value" type="s:string"/> <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="Tolerance" type="s:boolean"/> <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="ToleranceType" type="tmp:ToleranceType"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> <s:simpleType name="ToleranceType"> <s:restriction base="s:string"> <s:enumeration value="NONE"/> </s:restriction> </s:simpleType> <s:element name="ValidateSecretsResponse"> <s:complexType> <s:sequence> <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="ValidateSecretsResult" type="tmp:ValidationResponse"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> </s:element> <s:complexType name="ValidationResponse"> <s:sequence> <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="IsValidationValid" type="s:boolean"/> <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="ValidationResults" type="tmp:ArrayOfValidationResult"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> <s:complexType name="ArrayOfValidationResult"> <s:sequence> <s:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="ValidationResult" nillable="true" type="tmp:ValidationResult"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> <s:complexType name="ValidationResult"> <s:sequence> <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="ItemName" type="s:string"/> <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="Result" type="s:boolean"/> <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="ResultCode" type="tmp:ValidationResultCode"/> <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="ResultPublishMessages" type="tmp:ArrayOfValidationMessage"/> <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="ResultDisplayMessages" type="tmp:ArrayOfValidationMessage"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> <s:simpleType name="ValidationResultCode"> <s:restriction base="s:string"> <s:enumeration value="UNKNOWN_KEY"/> <s:enumeration value="UNKNOWN_ITEM"/> <s:enumeration value="MATCH"/> <s:enumeration value="NO_MATCH"/> </s:restriction> </s:simpleType> <s:complexType name="ArrayOfValidationMessage"> <s:sequence> <s:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="ValidationMessage" nillable="true" type="tmp:ValidationMessage"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> <s:complexType name="ValidationMessage"> <s:sequence> <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="Locale" type="tmp:Locale"/> <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Message" type="s:string"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> <s:simpleType name="Locale"> <s:restriction base="s:string"> <s:enumeration value="ENGLISH"/> <s:enumeration value="FRENCH"/> </s:restriction> </s:simpleType> <s:element name="IsPIDPermittedAccess"> <s:complexType> <s:sequence> <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="sessionID" type="s:string"/> <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="PID" type="s:string"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> </s:element> <s:element name="IsPIDPermittedAccessResponse"> <s:complexType> <s:sequence> <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="IsPIDPermittedAccessResult" type="s:boolean"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> </s:element> </s:schema>

<xsd:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://interoperability.gc.ca/fault/2.0/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:fault="http://interoperability.gc.ca/fault/2.0/"> <!--Technical Faults--> <xsd:element name="ValidationFault" substitutionGroup="fault:Fault"/> <xsd:element name="ServiceUnavailableFault" substitutionGroup="fault:Fault"/> <xsd:element name="GenericFault" substitutionGroup="fault:Fault"/> <xsd:element name="InvalidCredentialsFault" substitutionGroup="fault:Fault"/> <xsd:element name="UnauthorizedFault" substitutionGroup="fault:Fault"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="eng">Unauthorized</xsd:documentation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="fre">Non autoris√©</xsd:documentation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="eng">A fault to indicate that the operation is unauthorized.</xsd:documentation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="fre">Une erreur pour indiquer que l'op√©ration est non autoris√©e.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="DocumentLockedFault" substitutionGroup="fault:Fault"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="eng">Document Locked Fault</xsd:documentation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="fre">Erreur de document bloqu√©</xsd:documentation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="eng">A fault to indicate that the document is locked.</xsd:documentation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="fre">Une erreur pour indiquer que le document est verrouill√©.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="MaxFileSizeExceededFault" substitutionGroup="fault:Fault"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="eng">Maximum File Size Exceeded Fault</xsd:documentation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="fre">Erreur de taille de fichier maximale d√©pass√©e</xsd:documentation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="eng">A fault to indicate that the document exceeded maximum file size.</xsd:documentation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="fre">Une erreur pour indiquer que le document a d√©pass√© la taille de fichier maximale.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <!--Business Faults--> <xsd:element name="EmploymentProgramCaseFault" substitutionGroup="fault:Fault"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="eng">Employment Program Case Fault</xsd:documentation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="fre">Erreur de cas du programme d'emploi</xsd:documentation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="eng">A fault to indicate that the Employment Program Case processing was not successful.</xsd:documentation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="fre">Une erreur indiquant que le traitement du cas du programme d'emploi n'a pas abouti.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="PersonEmploymentAssociationFault" substitutionGroup="fault:Fault"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="eng">Person Employment Association Fault</xsd:documentation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="fre">Erreur d'Association Personne et Emploi</xsd:documentation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="eng">A fault to indicate that the Person Employment association processing was not successful.</xsd:documentation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="fre">Une erreur indiquant que le traitment d'association personne et emploi n'a pas r√©ussi.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="DocumentNotFoundFault" substitutionGroup="fault:Fault"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="eng">Document Not Found</xsd:documentation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="fre">Document non trouv√©</xsd:documentation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="eng">A fault to indicate that the document could not be found given the request and/or the document is no longer available.</xsd:documentation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="fre">Une erreur indiquant que le document n'a pas pu √™tre trouv√© √©tant donn√© la demande et / ou le document n'est plus disponible.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="DuplicateEntityFault" substitutionGroup="fault:Fault"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="eng">Duplicate entity</xsd:documentation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="fre">Entit√© en double</xsd:documentation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="eng">A fault to indicate that the entry is duplicate.</xsd:documentation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="fre">Une erreur pour indiquer que l'entr√©e est en double.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="EntityNotFoundFault" substitutionGroup="fault:Fault"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="eng">Entity Not Found</xsd:documentation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="fre">Entit√© introuvable</xsd:documentation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="eng">A fault to indicate that the entity could not be found.</xsd:documentation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="fre">Une erreur pour indiquer que l'entit√© n'a pas pu √™tre trouv√©e.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ErrorCode" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="DescriptionText" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="TransactionControlIdentificationID" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="ZuluDateTime" type="xsd:dateTime"/> <xsd:attribute name="retryable" type="xsd:boolean"/> <xsd:element name="Details" type="fault:AnyType"/> <xsd:complexType name="AnyType"> <xsd:choice> <xsd:any maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" namespace="##other" processContents="lax"/> <xsd:element name="Text" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:choice> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="Fault" type="fault:FaultType"/> <xsd:complexType name="FaultType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" ref="fault:ErrorCode"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" ref="fault:DescriptionText"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" ref="fault:Details"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" ref="fault:TransactionControlIdentificationID"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" ref="fault:ZuluDateTime"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attribute ref="fault:retryable" use="optional"/> <xsd:attribute name="id" type="xsd:ID" use="optional"/> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>
